front.title: The use of AES-192 and AES-256 in Secure RTP

abstract.t: This memo describes the use of the Advanced Encryption Standard (AES)with 192 and 256 bit keys within the Secure RTP protocol. It definesCounter Mode encryption for SRTP and SRTCP and a new SRTP KeyDerivation Function (KDF) for AES-192 and AES-256.
